"T:The Underground Nightmare":
"We've detected readings resembling those
of [Apprentice] in Omega, under the desert
of the Kingdom of Epic.
Escort the Photon Particle Cannon Carrier
to the location of the [Apprentice] readings
and use it to repel whatever you find!
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Fail objective, time limit expires,
Photon Particle Cannon Carrier destroyed"

"From here on out, we'll begin the
fight against Dark Falz Apprentice
under the Kingdom of Epic."

"The first stage of this fight will
require you to escort our special
weapon, the \"Photon Particle
Cannon Carrier\", to the final area."

"If we can reach the final area,
we should be able to defeat it.
However, we expect a counterattack
while we're in there, so watch out!"
